Text:
So far 75% pure Hit&Runs.

One go more, and seeding would be aborted.
Good to hear that everyone is doing good. thanks for the info. BTW idk if green suits me or not.. but it suits you a lot. :)

Many thanks for sharing your work...
Live Long and Prosper...
Spirit...

@ ALL - Please LOGIN (create an account if you do not have one) and click the [+] symbol beside QUALITY at top of page for ALL torrents you DL from 20-40.  It makes a difference; shows you care and that his work is appreciated for the genius that it is! Don't forget to seed back at least 1/1...

Be Cool !
